description:
Socket an Artifact's [slot_trait] Trait Slot with this item to gain this trait:\n\nMaster of Minotaurs:
Your {RACE_Minotaur}s {ACTION_attack} 1 additional time for each {RACE_Minotaur} fighting on your side. Your creatures deal 25% less damage. This trait does not stack.
name: Sigil of the Minotaur
